item.title: Need Help With This HTML Code
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Well here ya go:

this is dark green:

[code]

table, tr, td {background-color:transparent; border:none; border-width:0;} body{ background-color:rgb(18,1,7); background-image:url('http://www.layoutstar.com/image/music/bg/2/drum.jpg'); background-attachment: fixed; background-position:top left; background-repeat:no-repeat; border-color:rgb(38,99,5); border-width:5px; border-style:dashed; scrollbar-face-color:rgb(139,8,54); scrollbar-3dlight-color:rgb(139,8,54); scrollbar-highlight-color:rgb(179,10,70); scrollbar-shadow-color:rgb(219,12,85); scrollbar-darkshadow-color:rgb(243,31,106); scrollbar-arrow-color:rgb(255,255,255); scrollbar-track-color:rgb(243,31,106);} table table{border:0px} table table table table{border:0px} table table table{ border-style:dashed;border-width:3px; border-color:rgb(46,184,59); background-color:transparent;} table table table td{ background-color:rgb(99,5,38); filter:alpha(opacity=90); -moz-opacity:90; opacity:90; -khtml-opacity:90;} table table table table td {filter:none;} table, tr, td, li, p, div { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(255,255,255); font-size:12px;} .btext { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(85,219,12); font-size:12px;} .blacktext10 { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(85,219,12); font-size:12px;} .blacktext12 { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(18,1,7); font-size:12px;} .lightbluetext8 { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(255,255,255); font-size:12px;} .orangetext15 { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(85,219,12); font-size:12px;} .redtext { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(85,219,12); font-size:12px;} .redbtext { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(255,255,255); font-size:12px;} .text { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(255,255,255); font-size:12px; font-weight:bold;} .whitetext12 { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(85,219,12); font-size:12px; font-weight:bold;} a:active, a:visited, a:link { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(243,31,106); font-size:12px;} a:hover { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(179,10,70); font-size:12px;} a.navbar:active, a.navbar:visited, a.navbar:link { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(243,31,106); font-size:12px;} a.navbar:hover { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(179,10,70); font-size:12px;} a.redlink:active, a.redlink:visited, a.redlink:link { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(243,31,106); font-size:12px;} a.redlink:hover { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(179,10,70); font-size:12px;} .nametext { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(85,219,12); font-size:12px;} .contactTable { width:300px !important; height:150px !important; padding:0px !important; background-image:url('http://www.layoutstar.com/image/music/ct/2/drum.jpg'); background-attachment:scroll; background-position:center center; background-repeat:no-repeat; background-color:transparent;} .contactTable table, table.contactTable td { padding:0px !important; border:0px; background-color:transparent; background-image:none;} .contactTable a img {visibility:hidden; border:0px !important;} .contactTable .text {font-size:1px !important;} .contactTable .text, .contactTable a, .contactTable img {filter:none !important;} .contactTable .whitetext12 {display:none;} table table table td {vertical-align:top ! important;} span.blacktext12 { visibility:visible !important; background-color:transparent; background-image:url('http://www.layoutstar.com/image/music/bn/2/drum.jpg'); background-repeat:no-repeat; background-position:center center; font-size:0px; letter-spacing:-0.5px; width:435px; height:150px; display:block !important;} span.blacktext12 img {display:none;} [/code]

and this is light green:

[code]

table, tr, td {background-color:transparent; border:none; border-width:0;} body{ background-color:rgb(18,1,7); background-image:url('http://www.layoutstar.com/image/music/bg/2/drum.jpg'); background-attachment: fixed; background-position:top left; background-repeat:no-repeat; border-color:rgb(38,99,5); border-width:5px; border-style:dashed; scrollbar-face-color:rgb(139,8,54); scrollbar-3dlight-color:rgb(139,8,54); scrollbar-highlight-color:rgb(179,10,70); scrollbar-shadow-color:rgb(219,12,85); scrollbar-darkshadow-color:rgb(243,31,106); scrollbar-arrow-color:rgb(255,255,255); scrollbar-track-color:rgb(243,31,106);} table table{border:0px} table table table table{border:0px} table table table{ border-style:dashed;border-width:3px; border-color:rgb(55,123,61); background-color:transparent;} table table table td{ background-color:rgb(99,5,38); filter:alpha(opacity=90); -moz-opacity:90; opacity:90; -khtml-opacity:90;} table table table table td {filter:none;} table, tr, td, li, p, div { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(255,255,255); font-size:12px;} .btext { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(85,219,12); font-size:12px;} .blacktext10 { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(85,219,12); font-size:12px;} .blacktext12 { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(18,1,7); font-size:12px;} .lightbluetext8 { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(255,255,255); font-size:12px;} .orangetext15 { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(85,219,12); font-size:12px;} .redtext { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(85,219,12); font-size:12px;} .redbtext { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(255,255,255); font-size:12px;} .text { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(255,255,255); font-size:12px; font-weight:bold;} .whitetext12 { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(85,219,12); font-size:12px; font-weight:bold;} a:active, a:visited, a:link { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(243,31,106); font-size:12px;} a:hover { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(179,10,70); font-size:12px;} a.navbar:active, a.navbar:visited, a.navbar:link { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(243,31,106); font-size:12px;} a.navbar:hover { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(179,10,70); font-size:12px;} a.redlink:active, a.redlink:visited, a.redlink:link { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(243,31,106); font-size:12px;} a.redlink:hover { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(179,10,70); font-size:12px;} .nametext { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(85,219,12); font-size:12px;} .contactTable { width:300px !important; height:150px !important; padding:0px !important; background-image:url('http://www.layoutstar.com/image/music/ct/2/drum.jpg'); background-attachment:scroll; background-position:center center; background-repeat:no-repeat; background-color:transparent;} .contactTable table, table.contactTable td { padding:0px !important; border:0px; background-color:transparent; background-image:none;} .contactTable a img {visibility:hidden; border:0px !important;} .contactTable .text {font-size:1px !important;} .contactTable .text, .contactTable a, .contactTable img {filter:none !important;} .contactTable .whitetext12 {display:none;} table table table td {vertical-align:top ! important;} span.blacktext12 { visibility:visible !important; background-color:transparent; background-image:url('http://www.layoutstar.com/image/music/bn/2/drum.jpg'); background-repeat:no-repeat; background-position:center center; font-size:0px; letter-spacing:-0.5px; width:435px; height:150px; display:block !important;} span.blacktext12 img {display:none;} [/code]

I also removed all the advertisement garbage from the bottom.

item.title: Need Help With This HTML Code
item.dc:creator: @fat_mustard fat mustard
item.description:
@fat_mustard wrote:

ok don’t laugh… but i was looking for a new backround for my myspace and i found this cool one but the borders and stuff is pink… which is not happening so could somebody that knows a little more about html then me change it so it’s a red or a green. Thank You So Much!!![br][size=1]Posted on: July 19, 2007, 11:02:58 AM[/size][hr]
table, tr, td {background-color:transparent; border:none; border-width:0;}
body{
background-color:rgb(18,1,7);
background-image:url(‘http://www.layoutstar.com/image/music/bg/2/drum.jpg’);
background-attachment: fixed;
background-position:top left;
background-repeat:no-repeat;
border-color:rgb(38,99,5);
border-width:5px;
border-style:dashed;
scrollbar-face-color:rgb(139,8,54);
scrollbar-3dlight-color:rgb(139,8,54);
scrollbar-highlight-color:rgb(179,10,70);
scrollbar-shadow-color:rgb(219,12,85);
scrollbar-darkshadow-color:rgb(243,31,106);
scrollbar-arrow-color:rgb(255,255,255);
scrollbar-track-color:rgb(243,31,106);}
table table{border:0px}
table table table table{border:0px}
table table table{
border-style:dashed;border-width:3px;
border-color:rgb(219,12,85);
background-color:transparent;}
table table table td{
background-color:rgb(99,5,38);
filter:alpha(opacity=90); -moz-opacity:90; opacity:90; -khtml-opacity:90;}
table table table table td {filter:none;}
table, tr, td, li, p, div { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(255,255,255); font-size:12px;}
.btext { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(85,219,12); font-size:12px;}
.blacktext10 { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(85,219,12); font-size:12px;}
.blacktext12 { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(18,1,7); font-size:12px;}
.lightbluetext8 { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(255,255,255); font-size:12px;}
.orangetext15 { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(85,219,12); font-size:12px;}
.redtext { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(85,219,12); font-size:12px;}
.redbtext { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(255,255,255); font-size:12px;}
.text { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(255,255,255); font-size:12px; font-weight:bold;}
.whitetext12 { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(85,219,12); font-size:12px; font-weight:bold;}
a:active, a:visited, a:link { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(243,31,106); font-size:12px;}
a:hover { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(179,10,70); font-size:12px;}
a.navbar:active, a.navbar:visited, a.navbar:link { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(243,31,106); font-size:12px;}
a.navbar:hover { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(179,10,70); font-size:12px;}
a.redlink:active, a.redlink:visited, a.redlink:link { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(243,31,106); font-size:12px;}
a.redlink:hover { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(179,10,70); font-size:12px;}
.nametext { font-family:helvetica; color:rgb(85,219,12); font-size:12px;}
.contactTable {
width:300px !important; height:150px !important; padding:0px !important;
background-image:url(‘http://www.layoutstar.com/image/music/ct/2/drum.jpg’);
background-attachment:scroll; background-position:center center;
background-repeat:no-repeat; background-color:transparent;}
.contactTable table, table.contactTable td { padding:0px !important;
border:0px; background-color:transparent; background-image:none;}
.contactTable a img {visibility:hidden; border:0px !important;}
.contactTable .text {font-size:1px !important;}
.contactTable .text, .contactTable a, .contactTable img {filter:none !important;}
.contactTable .whitetext12 {display:none;}
table table table td {vertical-align:top ! important;}
span.blacktext12 {
visibility:visible !important;
background-color:transparent;
background-image:url(‘http://www.layoutstar.com/image/music/bn/2/drum.jpg’);
background-repeat:no-repeat;
background-position:center center;
font-size:0px; letter-spacing:-0.5px;
width:435px; height:150px; display:block !important;}
span.blacktext12 img {display:none;}

Drum Myspace Layouts in Music Myspace Layouts

Myspace Comments | Myspace Graphics | Myspace Surveys
